Riverhouse 0 Skip to Content Riverhouse Menus Private Events Specials & Events Gift Cards Live Cam Jobs Feedback Contact Order Online Reservations Open Menu Close Menu Riverhouse Menus Private Events Specials & Events Gift Cards Live Cam Jobs Feedback Contact Order Online Reservations Open Menu Close Menu Menus Private Events Specials & Events Gift Cards Live Cam Jobs Feedback Contact Order Online Reservations Reservations One Location Three Waterfront Dining Experiences Sitting on the Manatee River, the Riverhouse Waterfront Restaurant features three dining experiences under one roof. The Riverhouse is located at the end of the Safe Harbor Regatta Pointe Marina pier offering a golf cart ride to and from the parking lot. Book a Table Reef & Grill Located on the ground floor and open daily for lunch and dinner, the Reef & Grill is our flagship dining experience offering indoor and outdoor seating year round. Loved by locals and raved by travelers, the Reef & Grill has been serving up seafood fare and all-American inspired dishes since 2009. Book a table Snook Deck An extension of the Reef & Grill, the Snook Deck is our waterfront patio bar open afternoon and evenings weather permitting. Enjoy cold brews, sunset views and acoustic tunes from local musicians. Live music plays almost every weekend and grab a bite from our limited menu. Seats are first come first serve. Browse our menu Second FloorSecond Floor The Second Floor dining experience, open on Friday and Saturday evenings, is closed for the month of September 2025 due to off season and private events booked. We will reopen with a new menu and offerings in the fall. Join us on the ground level open daily for lunch and dinner. Learn more about our three private event spaces available on the second floor complete with floor to ceiling windows, a dedicated events manager and our onsite culinary team Book a Private Event Specials & Upcoming Events Looking for something fun to do? Check out our can’t miss specials and upcoming events. Learn more The Riverhouse has been serving the historic Palmetto district since February 2009 and is family owned and operated by long time county residents. This restaurant is the heart and soul of the VanDerNoord family and it’s our prayer that your experience lives up to the standard of excellence we strive for every day. Reservations Menus Gift Cards Jobs Feedback Contact 941-729-0616 info@riverhousereef.com Location 995 Riverside Drive Palmetto, Florida 34221 Hours Monday - Thursday 11:30am to 9pm Friday 11:30am to 10pm Saturday 11am to 10pm Sunday 11am to 9pm Social Facebook Instagram Misc Coast Seafood Grill Urban Taco Employee Portal

Riverhouse Waterfront Restaurant - Paradise by the Bay Home Property About Us Experiences Home Property About Us Experiences Book Now Become a Host Places To Eat Riverhouse Waterfront Restaurant Overlooking the scenic Manatee River, Riverhouse Waterfront Restaurant in Palmetto is a captivating dining destination offering a blend of picturesque views and culinary excellence. With its prime waterfront location, this restaurant features a diverse menu showcasing fresh and locally sourced ingredients. Guests can savor a range of delectable dishes while enjoying the gentle breezes from the river. The inviting atmosphere, paired with attentive service, makes Riverhouse Waterfront Restaurant an ideal spot for memorable dining experiences, whether for casual gatherings or special occasions. Photo credit: Riverhouse Waterfront Restaurant Visit Link +1 941-729-0616 995 Riverside Dr, Palmetto, FL 34221, United States Some Places You Might Like Manatee County Beach Activities Visit Link (941)742-5923 000 State Road 64 and Gulf Drive, Holmes Beach, FL 34217, United States Manatee County Beach, situated along the stunning Gulf of Mexico coastline in Florida, offers a picturesque and family-friendly coastal destination. The Waterfront Restaurant Places To Eat Visit Link +1 941-778-1515 111 S Bay Blvd, Anna Maria, FL 34216, United States Easygoing spot featuring global seafood dishes, a beer-&-wine bar & outdoor seating by the beach. Fill out our online application or stop in and ask to speak with a manager to get started. Name * First Name Last Name Address * Address 1 Address 2 City State/Province Zip/Postal Code Country Email * Phone * (###) ### #### Are you currently employed? If so, where? * Name of current or last restaurant you've worked at? * Tell us about your restaurant experience, if any. * Position you're interested in: * Are you looking for full time or part time? * Availability * Lunch (Mon - Fri) Lunch (Sat - Sun) Dinner (Mon - Fri) Dinner (Sat - Sun) Range of $$ you need: * Under 18 or 21? * For alcohol serving and kitchen equipment handling purposes Under 18 18 to 20 21 or over Have your ever been convicted of a felony? * Yes No If yes, please explain Tell us about yourself: * Why are you interested in our company? * Thank you! About | River House Wine & Bar Home About River House wine & bar River House wine & bar River House wine & bar River House wine & bar Home About More Home About River House wine & bar River House wine & bar River House wine & bar River House wine & bar Home About About Us Welcome to River House Wine & Bar Welcome to River House Wine & Bar – A Timeless Escape on the Iconic Miami River Nestled within Miami’s oldest operating hotel and perched along the iconic Miami River, River House Wine & Bar is a hidden gem where history, charm, and warm hospitality come together. With its vintage allure, intimate ambiance, and scenic riverfront views, our bar offers a unique retreat for those who appreciate fine wines, artisanal tapas, and the comforting aroma of a wood-fired pizza oven. Perfect for Every Occasion ✔ A pre-dinner wine and cheese experience with a view ✔ A romantic riverside date night ✔ A casual gathering with friends over tapas, wine, and pizza ✔ An escape into Miami’s rich history with a touch of old-world charm Whether you choose to unwind indoors in our cozy, vintage-inspired space or outside by the water, River House Wine & Bar offers the perfect setting to relax, indulge, and soak in the magic of Miami’s riverfront charm. Join Us for a Taste of the Past, Wrapped in the Comforts of Today Let us welcome you to a place where every sip, every bite, and every moment tells a story. Whether you’re a local looking for a hidden gem or a traveler discovering Miami’s historic riverside charm, we look forward to sharing our passion for wine, food, and warm hospitality with you. A Culinary Experience, Crafted by You At River House Wine & Bar, we invite you to indulge in the art of personalization. Select from a handpicked variety of artisanal cheeses and premium cured meats to build your perfect charcuterie board, complemented by our curated wine selection from renowned vineyards around the world. Every bite and sip is designed to transport you to a world of refined flavors and relaxed indulgence. For those craving something warm and rustic, our wood-fired oven is the heart of our kitchen, serving up perfectly crisp, handcrafted pizzas made with fresh, high-quality ingredients. Whether it’s a classic Margherita, a truffle-infused creation, or a bold Mediterranean-inspired pie, each bite reflects our commitment to authentic flavors and artisanal craftsmanship. A Historic & Scenic Escape Housed within Miami’s most historic operational hotel and located right on the banks of the Miami River, our bar blends the romance of the past with the vibrant energy of the present. The vintage interiors, paired with stunning waterfront views, create an atmosphere that is both nostalgic and effortlessly chic—a place where time slows down, and every moment is meant to be savored. Live Music to Elevate Your Evenings Immerse yourself in the soulful rhythms of live Latin jazz and bossa nova, setting the perfect tone for a refined yet relaxed night. Join us every Friday and Saturday from 8 PM to 11 PM, as talented musicians create an enchanting ambiance, blending timeless melodies with the warm glow of the riverfront. Let the music flow as effortlessly as the wine, enhancing every sip, every bite, and every moment at River House Wine & Bar.
